;

;In March 2023, Lu Xianren appeared for the first time on the Paris Fashion Week show. He was invited to walk the show, wearing a black silhouette suit, white trousers and a neat hairstyle. He was one of the few non-scientific models present, and his starting point on the catwalk was on a rural road in Guangxi.

;

;In 2019, Lu Xianren, who was working in Guangdong, quit his job and returned to his hometown in Guangxi to shoot short videos full-time. He always wanted to be a model, so most of the photos he took were of him walking in shows. The clothing is all homemade, made from woven bags, blankets, waterproof plastic sheets, old lampshades, branches, leaves... match the upper body and walk in the mountains.

;

;He worked hard for more than a month, but the account was not as popular as he imagined. It was already summer, and the sultry weather also affected his mood: Was he unable to achieve results no matter what? It's better to be more casual and show yourself. So in the high temperature, he put on the red blanket at home as clothes and walked barefoot for a while. This random move immediately brought about a heat stroke and high fever, but it also brought a huge number of likes. Lu Xianren woke up from his sleep and saw the number of likes on the video rising, and even doubted the authenticity of the matter.

;

;In the end, this video became popular on the platform, with more than 2 million likes. He's on fire.

;

;The short video era gives everyone the opportunity to experience the "15 minutes of fame". It has become easy for ordinary people to produce a popular video. In the ocean of traffic, there will always be a point where you can Hit a group of people. However, it is not easy to make this flow sustainable. But Lu Xianren did not hesitate. When he decided to shoot short videos full-time, he had already conceived many ideas. So if it wasn’t because of the red blanket that it became popular, would it also be because of other creative ideas? Lu Xianren laughed at this: "Not necessarily." He still showed a cautious attitude towards his fame.

;

;Lu Xianren, whose real name is Lu Kaigang, was born in Heng County, Guangxi in 1999. His parents worked outside all year round, and he was raised by his grandparents. When he was in fifth grade, he saw a modeling competition on TV and was attracted by the models' aura and outfits. It became his dream to walk on the catwalk. From then on, when he got home from school, he would take time to practice Tai step. He was originally a little hunched, but after practicing he opened his shoulders and held his head high. When practicing, hold a book on your head. "The book cannot go away, so the steps are formed."

;

;After three months, the book is firmly on the head. "But what I learned more is their confidence on the stage and the way they want to express themselves on the stage." Today's Lu Xianren said.

;

;After dropping out of middle school, Lu Kaigang went to Guangdong to work. He worked as an apprentice in a barber shop and a restaurant, and then worked in a factory. He used his spare time to continue his modeling studies. He recorded videos and compared them with professional models' pace, down to the time to keep his head and the number of seconds to pause when positioning.

;

;In 2018, he started shooting his own videos. When choosing the nickname for his account, he thought of his home in the mountains. Every day when he got up, he could see the mist outside the window. It was "very fairy", so he named himself "Lu Xianren".

;

;A year later, he decided to quit his job and return to his hometown to shoot short videos full-time. "Give yourself half a year, and if it doesn't work, go back and work honestly." Hence the subsequent story. After that, his creative juices flowed and his modeling career got on the right track.

;

;Lu Xianren is 180 centimeters tall and wears women's clothing in most of the videos. This time it was not understood. Some relatives saw the video and ran to ask Lu Xianren's family: "Why is your child like this?" Grandma said: Young people have their own ideas, and they must have their own reasons for what they do, so just leave them alone.

;

;;

;

;;(Photo taken by Honor 100 series);

;

;My current life is not It counts as a full score, but try to go in the direction of full score

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;2023 3 In March, you participated in the Paris Fashion Week catwalk for the first time. You are a new face in the international fashion world. What new characteristics do you think you have? ;

;

;;Lu Xianren:;;The fashion industry has never lacked new faces. On the international stage, I have been recognized by more people, and the global fashion media have discovered me. A new face, discovering maybe a new strength. Mainly, I (this type) are relatively rare in the fashion industry, and I personally feel more special. And "new" represents a new force, the ability to move forward, and an opportunity. ;

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;catwalk on the international stage and in the countryside What's the difference? ;

;

;;Lu Xianren:;;I personally think it is a change in mentality. At the beginning, when I walked the show on rural trails and country roads, I was just enjoying the scenery, which I thought was beautiful. After going to Paris Fashion Week, I felt a little nervous for the first time. I slowly adapted and enjoyed it. I slowly began to interact with the audience and resonate with the designers. I seemed to have a passion for their clothes and their love. Perception, there is a spiritual connection. ;

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;The show left in your mind What is the first screen? ;

;

; ; Lu Xianren: ; ; When the last curtain was tested, the audience beckoned with the designer and applauded. I have walked in so many shows, some of which were applauded by the audience, and some of which the audience left immediately after the show. In that show, most of them stood up and applauded. They must have found something they like and resonated with. ;

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;The way you appear in the camera is very professional , what kind of training have you received for this? ;

;

;;Lu Xianren: ;;While visiting the scene, I observed some photography teachers. In what state did they take photos? I think taking pictures has something to do with the state. I don’t like to pose in a pose for taking pictures, or to set up a big scene for taking pictures. ;

;

;I personally take photos more casually. When I encounter good scenery or beautiful things, I will take pictures and record them. I bought a smartphone in 2016. At that time, I was still shooting the scenery, I didn't dare to shoot myself, and I was not very confident.

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;What do you think a good photo should look like? ;

;

;;Lu Xianren: ;;The first thing is to attract attention, and then have a sense of story and impact. I may not pay much attention to a certain detail in the whole photo, but I will pay attention to the general appearance. A photo cannot be 100% perfect, 98% or 95% perfect, and this photo may be remembered for a long time. I don’t really like to make perfect photos. When I photoshop, I will keep my flaws and spots. I am still satisfied with myself and pay more attention to the quality of the photos. ;

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;Do you have any suggestions for everyone to take photos? ;

;

;;Lu Xianren:;;If you are not particularly confident, then you don’t have to look at the camera all the time. The camera is not that important. Taking photos is to record what is happening at the moment. When you are not looking at the camera, you can fully show your relaxed state. ;

;

;My confidence comes from my love for the lens, plus I like taking pictures - the feeling of the camera clicking out. The moment the camera presses the shutter button, it records the present moment. I think it is a very magical thing. Nowadays, everyone can take a camera and take pictures at any time. When I take pictures, I don’t necessarily mean what kind of pictures I will take. When I take pictures, I record what I want to do at the moment. When you look at it later, you will know that you were quite happy at that time.

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;How would you rate your current life? ;

;

;;Lu Xianren:;;I think the ideal full-scoring life is half life and half the work. But I think it doesn’t have to be perfect to have a perfect life, it depends on the pace of life. For example, I may have been very busy some time ago. After finishing my work, I went home to take a rest, spend time with my grandma, and look for new inspiration. Life and work need to coordinate with each other. My current life is not perfect, but I will try my best to move towards it. ;

;On the stage of the third season of "Summer of the Band", the song "Big Dream" made the Waina band popular, and there were many invitations to perform. Shiba was farming in his hometown and working as a street singer in Guilin.

;;Southern People Weekly:;;You performed outstandingly in "Summer of the Band". Although it has been 10 years since your debut, you are a new face to the public. What do you think of this “newness”? ;

;;Vayna: ;;The reason why we went to participate was just for a stage. I have loved writing songs for a long time, but I haven’t had the opportunity to communicate with everyone. This stage allows us to freely express our original attitudes. Sing the songs we want to sing authentically. ;

;From the perspective of Lumin and Shiba, they are indeed young and new. And I (; Editor's Note: 岜 岜 而 ;) has sang for many years, but I just heard that everyone heard this stage for the first time. ;

;;

;

;Ban farmers inspect old rice varieties in their fields;(Photo provided by interviewee);

;;Southern People Weekly:;;After getting on this stage, will the invitations and performances that are pouring in come to me? Destroy your rhythm of life and affect your original attitude? ;

;

;;Waina:;;If we don’t have a clear direction, we will be destroyed, but if we have a good direction, it is not destruction; To help us build the state we want, it mainly depends on how we grasp it. ;

;

;We still pay more attention to our own lives, and now we have agreed to spend half a month living at home and half a month doing more communication outside. Of course, this half-month plan is a regular plan. If you are busy with farming or have something to do at home, you can adjust it slightly.

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;Will your creations be affected? ;

;

;;Vayna: ;;It’s still land, it’s the relationship between land and people, it’s something real (things) related to life, coming from experience A little more stuff. We prefer to express some emotions from contemporary real life, rather than purely creating or imagining something. This kind of thing derived from reality also has artistic modification techniques. ;We have no limits on what we want to create, but there may be a starting point. ;;Southern People Weekly:;;A song like "Big Dream" is not considered traditional Waina style, but it has attracted many people now. Will your future creations be biased? ;

;

;;Waina: ;;It is still close to a portrayal of real life, like "Grandma Returns" written by Lu Min. That song is Hakka. But Waina is from the Zhuang ethnic group, so that’s fine. It’s still a very rural and authentic creation. The so-called reality means that it is like something growing out of the ground. It does not mean that we just make a flower. Of course, that is also a kind of beauty and a kind of consciousness, but Wayna prefers this aspect (reality). ;

;

;(Everyone likes "Big Dream") It's okay, everyone likes it. Let's just sing "Big Dream" three times first and then sing country. Good.

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;Are you satisfied with your current life? ;

;

;;Vayna: ;;It mainly depends on how to design. Everything has to be redesigned. There is no fixed life or a satisfactory life for you. , you should (adjust) it based on comfort and realism at any time, and don’t drift. ;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;Waina Band was not a banker at the beginning , Lu Min and Shiba 3 members, will you stick to the current lineup in the future? ;

;

;;Vayna: ;;This is sometimes like asking whether you will get divorced after getting married? I feel like it's flowing, don't try to kidnap a band. The important thing is to always maintain the expression and experience of life. ;

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;You enjoy the feeling of being photographed in front of the camera ? ;

;

;;Vayna:;;（;Shakes his head; );

;;Southern People Weekly:;;Do you usually like to take pictures? ;

;

;;Wayna:;;（;岜农;) Usually I can take pictures if I want to. I still like to take pictures of picking wild fruits and pricking them. ;

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;What do you think is the standard for a good photo? ;

;

;;Waina:;;Sometimes I look through my hard drive and find some photos that I thought were interesting at the time and beautifully posed, but in fact they are not. use. What's really useful? I did it, I filmed it. It reminded me of the actual experience and feelings of doing that thing. ;

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;How do you define a perfect life? ;

;

;;Vayna: ;;Everyone should be different. He should find his most comfortable state, live freely, and be able to realize the meaning of life. Everyone is looking for that spot in him, and I found it early on. ;

;

;The word "full marks" divides life. From the perspective of the whole life, every stage is a part of your life, just like a river. Which section do you like best? Waters? In fact, no stretch of water represents the river. I think every individual is a perfect score. If you can love yourself and let go like this, you will be a perfect score.

;

;Among the PhDs interviewed, Zeng Zhiping may be the last to obtain a PhD. In January 2007, he graduated early from China University of Political Science and Law and became China's first doctor of military law - 24 years had passed since the first batch of doctors trained after the reform and opening up were awarded degrees.

;

;In fact, as a secondary discipline under the category of law, the process of military law becoming a discipline is relatively late.

;

;In 1984, legal scholars Zhang Youyu and Pan Nianzhi first proposed that military law is a branch of the legal system in the "Encyclopedia of China·Law Volume"; three years later, in May 1987, the former State Education Commission Formally listed military law as a branch of law; in 1993, the first teaching institution in the country to engage in military legal education -Xi'an Institute of Political Science (now the Xi'an Campus of the School of Political Science, School of Political Science of the People's Liberation Army) was established. Military law professional education is officially on the right track.

;

;In 2003, Xi'an Political College became the first school with the right to award a doctorate in military law; in the same year, China University of Political Science and Law opened a military law research center. In 2004, China University of Political Science and Law began to recruit doctoral students in military law. Also in this year, Zeng Zhiping, who had the rank of lieutenant colonel, transferred from Nanchang Army College and was admitted to China University of Political Science and Law in September of the same year, becoming the only doctoral student in military law enrolled that year.

;

;Zeng Zhiping studied under Professor Zhou Jian, a well-known expert in the field of military law and the first director of the Military Law Teaching and Research Office in China. Zhou Jian once pointed out in an article: "Among the top ten legal disciplines identified by the Ministry of Education, military law (030110) can be said to be the one with the least talents and the most difficult to research."

;

;Compared with law Among other majors, military law is a relatively mysterious and niche subject. Before changing careers, Zeng Zhiping worked in the army for 21 years. In a sense, it was his status as a soldier that gave him the opportunity to specialize in military law.

;

;In Zeng Zhiping’s view, today’s “openness” of military law is related to the atmosphere of the rule of law and the society’s demand for military legal talents.

;

;Military academy, army, and then to military academy

;

;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;After graduating from Nanchang Army Academy, what did you do Which jobs? ;

;

;;Zeng Zhiping: ;;After graduation, I was sent to the front-line army in Zhangzhou, Fujian. At that time, I was a platoon leader in a regiment. After a few months, I was transferred to the agency. ;

;Discipline Positioning

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;Why will you continue? Study law on your own? ;

;

;;Zeng Zhiping: ;;It’s a bit of a coincidence that something happened in the spring of 1993 that had a great impact on college students across the country: the International College Debate Competition , the one Jiang Changjian and the others participated in. Jiang Changjian majored in National Politics, so I wanted to go to Fudan to study for a graduate degree in International Politics. ;

;

;But later at school, I learned that several young men we hung out with were preparing to take the bar exam. I felt that this matter was definitely the right thing to do. After weighing it, I said that I would study law instead of international politics. International politics is a "dragon-slaying art" and law is more practical. In 1994, I began to study law on my own in accordance with the requirements of the bar qualification examination syllabus. In October of that year, I ranked first in the military and qualified as a lawyer. ;(Southern Weekend Note: The national judicial examination system had not yet been established at that time, and you could obtain lawyer qualifications by passing the bar qualification examination.);;

;When I took the postgraduate entrance examination, I was not afraid of majors related to law. Because I had already passed the bar exam and my brain was good at that time, I thought I could pass the exam for any major.

;

;

;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;You developed a love for military law during your Ph.D. ? ;

;

;;Zeng Zhiping: ;;I can’t say it’s love. I just accumulated knowledge to a certain extent and have an understanding of this subject. On the other hand, I see a lot of work that is poorly written. I feel that my participation in this subject may make it better. ;
